ReturnPolicy.Description:
We check the item to be  in working condition before shipping. In some circumstances Returns accepted if you received wrong item or not as described. Otherwise we offer an exchange. All returns must be in original condition with box, tags, warranty book and must not be worn, sized, scratched or altered in any way. 
15% Restocking Fees may applied for returns.
Original shipping is not refundable.
Return shipping cost is the responsibility of the buyer and must have a tracking or confirmation number and packed properly. You must notify us of any return and the package must be accompanied with your name, address, email address, auction number and reason for return. When we received the item back, we will contact you and issue the refund.
